Class Aplicacao

extends java.lang.Object
    The type Aplication. This is the Main class where is the flow program. It's possible make a purchase and list all purschases did before.

      • verificaLogin

        public static Cliente verificaLogin​(java.lang.String email)
        Verify login client. Given email, if there is an email we log in and return the respective Client.
        Parameters:
        email - the email
        Returns:
        the client

      • login

        public static Cliente login()
        Login client. While the Cliente not logged in we ask for an email. In the end, we will return the respective client.
        Returns:
        the client
